entry.title: Monday night: Rain or drizzle. Low plus 5.
entry.summary: Rain ending after midnight then cloudy with 60 percent chance of drizzle or showers. Fog patches developing late this evening. Amount 10 mm. Wind southeast 40 km/h gusting to 70 diminishing to 20 gusting to 40 early this evening. Low plus 5. Forecast issued 5:15 PM ADT Monday 1 May 2023
